AdministratorAccess.title: AdministratorAccess
AdministratorAccess.description:
Administrator access for users:

 * N = No access
 * R = Read only access
 * W = Read/write access

AuditLogAction.title: AuditLogAction
AuditLogAction.description:
The type of the action:

 * C = Create
 * U = Update
 * D = Delete

AuditLogActorType.title: AuditLogActorType
AuditLogActorType.description:
The type of actor:

 * U = User
 * A = Agent
 * E = Endpoint
 * I = Idp

AuditLogResourceType.title: AuditLogResourceType
AuditLogResourceType.description:
The type of the resource:

* AGENT = agent
* APIKEY = apikey
* EGRESS_POLICY = egresspolicy
* ENDPOINT = endpoint
* EVENT_LOG_RULE = eventlogrule
* GATEWAY = gateway
* GROUP =  group
* ORCHESTRATOR = orchestrator
* POLICY = policy
* PROXY = proxy
* SERVICE = service
* SETTINGS = settings
* USER = user

EndpointAddressingMode.title: EndpointAddressingMode
EndpointAddressingMode.description:
Addressing mode for gateway nodes:

 * M = MAC address
 * V = VLAN id
 * N = NAT (Destination, IPv4)
 * S = NAT (Source+Destination, IPv4)

NodeType.title: NodeType
NodeType.description:
The type of the node:

 * O = Orchestrator
 * G = Gateway
 * U = User
 * A = Agent
